verses.verse: And afterward <S%H310><s%> Moses <S%H4971><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> came <S%H3843><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto Pharaoh <S%H6213><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, Let my people <S%H5971><s%> go <S%H7971><s%>, that they may hold a feast <S%H2287><s%> unto me in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>.

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Who is Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, that I should hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto his voice <S%H6963><s%> to let Israel <S%H3478><s%> go <S%H7971><s%>? I know <S%H3045><s%> not Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and moreover I will not let Israel <S%H3478><s%> go <S%H7971><s%>.

And they said <S%H559><s%>, The God <S%H430><s%> of the Hebrews <S%H5680><s%> hath met <S%H7122><s%> with us <S%H3212><s%>: let us go, we pray thee <S%H7969><s%>, three days <S%H3117><s%>' journey <S%H1870><s%> into the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, and sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>, lest he fall <S%H6293><s%> upon us with pestilence <S%H1698><s%>, or with the sword <S%H2719><s%>.

And the king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H4872><s%>, Wherefore do ye, Moses and Aaron <S%H175><s%>, loose <S%H6544><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> from their works <S%H4639><s%>? get <S%H3212><s%> you unto your burdens <S%H5450><s%>.

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Behold <S%H5971><s%>, the people of the land <S%H776><s%> are now many <S%H7227><s%>, and ye make them rest <S%H7673><s%> from their burdens <S%H5450><s%>.
And the same day <S%H3117><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> the taskmasters <S%H5065><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>, and their officers <S%H7860><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Ye shall no more <S%H3254><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> straw <S%H8401><s%> to make <S%H3835><s%> brick <S%H3843><s%>, as heretofore <S%H8032><s%>: let them go <S%H3212><s%> and gather <S%H7197><s%> straw for themselves <S%H8401><s%>.

And the number <S%H4971><s%> of the bricks <S%H3843><s%>, which they did make <S%H6213><s%> heretofore <S%H8032><s%>, ye shall lay <S%H7760><s%> upon them <S%H1639><s%>; ye shall not diminish aught thereof <S%H7503><s%>: for they are idle; therefore they cry <S%H6817><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Let us go <S%H3212><s%> and sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> to our God <S%H430><s%>.

Let heavier work <S%H5656><s%> be laid <S%H3513><s%> upon the men <S%H582><s%>, that they may labor <S%H6213><s%> therein <S%H8159><s%>; and let them not regard lying <S%H8267><s%> words <S%H1697><s%>.

And the taskmasters <S%H5065><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%>, and their officers <S%H7860><s%>, and they spake <S%H559><s%> to the people <S%H5971><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, I will not give <S%H5414><s%> you straw <S%H8401><s%>.

Go <S%H3212><s%> yourselves <S%H3947><s%>, get you straw <S%H8401><s%> where <S%H834><s%> ye can find <S%H4672><s%> it <S%H3588><s%>; for nought <S%H1697><s%> of your work <S%H5656><s%> shall be diminished <S%H1639><s%>.
So the people <S%H5971><s%> were scattered abroad <S%H6327><s%> throughout all the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> to gather <S%H7197><s%> stubble <S%H7179><s%> for straw <S%H8401><s%>.

And the taskmasters <S%H5065><s%> were urgent <S%H213><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Fulfil <S%H3615><s%> your works <S%H4639><s%>, your daily <S%H3117><s%> tasks <S%H1697><s%>, as when there was <S%H1961><s%> straw <S%H8401><s%>.

And the officers <S%H7860><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, whom Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s taskmasters <S%H5065><s%> had set <S%H7760><s%> over them <S%H5221><s%>, were beaten, and demanded <S%H559><s%>, Wherefore have ye not fulfilled <S%H3615><s%> your task <S%H2706><s%> both yesterday <S%H8543><s%> and to-day <S%H3117><s%>, in making brick <S%H3835><s%> as heretofore <S%H8032><s%>?

Then the officers <S%H7860><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and cried <S%H6817><s%> unto Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Wherefore dealest <S%H6213><s%> thou thus with thy servants <S%H5650><s%>?

There is no straw <S%H8401><s%> given <S%H5414><s%> unto thy servants <S%H5650><s%>, and they say <S%H559><s%> to us <S%H6213><s%>, Make brick <S%H3843><s%>: and <S%H5650><s%>, behold, thy servants are beaten <S%H5221><s%>; but the fault <S%H2398><s%> is in thine own people <S%H5971><s%>.
But he said <S%H559><s%>, Ye are idle <S%H7503><s%>, ye are idle <S%H7503><s%>: therefore ye say <S%H559><s%>, Let us go <S%H3212><s%> and sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> to Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

Go <S%H3212><s%> therefore now <S%H5647><s%>, and work; for there shall no straw <S%H8401><s%> be given <S%H5414><s%> you <S%H5414><s%>, yet shall ye deliver the number <S%H8506><s%> of bricks <S%H3843><s%>.

And the officers <S%H7860><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did see <S%H7200><s%> that they were in evil <S%H7451><s%> case <S%H559><s%>, when it was said, Ye shall not diminish <S%H1639><s%> aught from your bricks <S%H3843><s%>, your daily <S%H3117><s%> tasks <S%H1697><s%>.
And they met <S%H6293><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%>, who stood <S%H5324><s%> in the way <S%H7125><s%>, as they came forth <S%H3318><s%> from Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>:

and they said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H3068><s%>, Jehovah look <S%H7200><s%> upon you <S%H8199><s%>, and judge; because ye have made our savor <S%H7381><s%> to be abhorred <S%H887><s%> in the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, and in the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of his servants <S%H5650><s%>, to put <S%H5414><s%> a sword <S%H2719><s%> in their hand <S%H3027><s%> to slay us <S%H2026><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H136><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Lord <S%H136><s%>, wherefore hast thou dealt ill <S%H7489><s%> with this people <S%H5971><s%>? why is it that thou hast sent me <S%H7971><s%>?

For since I came <S%H935><s%> to Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> to speak <S%H1696><s%> in thy name <S%H8034><s%>, he hath dealt ill <S%H7489><s%> with this people <S%H5971><s%>; neither hast thou delivered <S%H5337><s%> thy people <S%H5971><s%> at all <S%H5337><s%>.
